## AbstractDevice.createTexture2DArrayFromMipmapData() method

Creates a 2d array texture from mipmap data

**Signature:**

```typescript
createTexture2DArrayFromMipmapData(data: TextureMipmapData, options?: TextureCreationOptions): Texture2DArray;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | [TextureMipmapData](doc/markdown/./device.texturemipmapdata.md) | mipmap data |
|  options | [TextureCreationOptions](doc/markdown/./device.texturecreationoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ The creation options |

**Returns:**

[Texture2DArray](doc/markdown/./device.texture2darray.md)
